execution_plan.description: Find users (id, username, full_name) who are members of chats whose name or description contains 'technical' (case-insensitive) in the app_chat database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT u.id AS chat_user_id, u.username, u.full_name FROM users u JOIN chat_members cm ON u.id = cm.user_id JOIN chats c ON cm.chat_id = c.id WHERE c.name ILIKE '%technical%' OR c.description ILIKE '%technical%';

execution_plan.description: Get posts and user info (post_id, post_user_id, username, email) from the app database for users whose username appears in step 1 (i.e., they participate in technical chats).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.id AS post_id, p.user_id AS post_user_id, u.username, u.email FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username IN ($step1.username);
